name: Evolutionary Dream
description:
You are a tiny crustacean in a small tidepool. Try to eat as much as you can to evolve.

Choose the right mutations and try to find advantageous nucleotide combos.

This is mostly a chill ambient type game, I hope you enjoy the experience.

This was made as a part of the Godot Go Jam 3.

Controls:

Just the mouse.

Tips:

Focus on strong teeth and lots of speed to turn the game into a tronbike-est simulator.

Credits:

Apart from the monogram font.

Music/art/programming is all done by me.
